{/* Hero / Title */}

Building the future of commerce, together

{/* Mission Section */}

Our Mission

Enable anyone to turn their passion into a business and bring people together through commerce.

{/* Stats Section */}
₹3B

Livestream sales

WhatNew surpassed ₹3 billion in livestream sales in 2024.

175,000 hrs/wk

Weekly livestream hours

More than 175,000 hours are hosted each week — ~800× QVC’s weekly broadcast hours.

₹1M

Avg. top-seller earnings

The top 500 sellers on WhatNew earn an average of ₹1M from sales annually.

What drives our mission? Our community.

Our founders created WhatNew to be a trusted space where like-minded people can buy, sell, and connect over the products they love—from fashion and streetwear to trading cards, sports cards, coins, comics, and more.

); }
